metadata.title: USN-5122-1 -- Apport vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apport could be tricked into writing core files as root into arbitrary directories in certain scenarios. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges. This update will cause Apport to generate all core files in the /var/lib/apport/coredump directory.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5122-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.21 No subscription required
